title: Omniscient

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Always Listening (Night, 1 use): Choose a player. You will receive all whispers sent to and from them the following day.
- Sore Throat (Day, 1 use): Choose a player. They will only be able to communicate by whispers for the remainder of the day.
- Chokehold (Night, 1 use): Choose a player who whispered yesterday. Deal a Basic attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - All whisper notifications will be disabled publicly; however, you will receive all whisper notifications.

desc:
Post 1089
*This is the story of a Town called Salem.*
